title: The Shining Light
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Ahh, we finally came to see the hydrangeas, but it started raining~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yeah. But hydrangeas in the rain are really beautiful too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>.....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>W-wait, did I say something weird?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Nope! You just look so beautiful when you look at the hydrangeas in the rain that I couldn’t help but stare!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Wha-What!? H-Honoka-chan, what are you saying~!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I’m not kidding!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Geez... Well then, I’m going to say something too! When I’m next to you, I feel like I’ll forget it’s even raining. You’re so bright and lively. It’s like the sun is shining!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Whaat!? That’s really nice of you to say, but you can’t forget about the rain! You’re gonna get soaked! Look, hold onto your umbrella properly!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ughhhh~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
